document_data.name: Olen Argent
document_data.mainbody: '''Olen Argent''' was a champion of good who lived in the years before the [[Era of Upheaval]].
document_data.Description: He was said to have been especially eloquent in his manner of speech.
document_data.Possessions: Olen owned a magnificent suit of [[Mail of the Hallowed Hero|enchanted chainmail armor]], which was gifted to him by his [[elven]] friends. It was worn many years later by [[Argent|his descendants]].
document_data.Relationships: Olen was the grandfather of the [[Lathanderite]] [[paladin]] [[Aun Argent]], and the great-grandfather of Aun's niece [[Caelar Argent|Caelar]].
document_data.History:
At some point in his life, Olen embarked upon a quest to hunt down a malevolent cult dedicated to the Beastlord [[Malar]]. When he traveled into the [[Misty Forest]] he encountered a group of [[elves]], who mistook Olen for a threat.

Olen spoke his peace in such an articulate manner that the elves helped him track down the Malarites. He then proceeded to cut down every last member of the cult, as justice for their killing spree.
